p: Turmeric has a diverse chemical composition, principally containing approximately 235 terpenoids and phenolic compounds [ 12], which are obtained through various extraction procedures. To be specific, there are about 6â€“8 monomeric phenylpropenes, 22 diarylheptanoids and diarylpentanoids, 109 sesquiterpenes, 68 monoterpenes, four steroids, two alkaloids, five diterpenes, three triterpenoids, fatty acids, and 12 other compounds, along with sugar, proteins, carbohydrates, fiber, minerals, and resin that were isolated and identified [ 12, 32].
